comments:
Create a 1.1 EJB Project with an ejb client with an EAR.  Create some annotated
session beans.  Now, delete all 3 projects.  You will see JDOM error in the log.

Can you take a look here?  Looks like its trying to do too much.

On WTP M8, create the ejb project with client, add TWO session beans from the
xdoclet wizard, and then delete all the projects.  You will get the error.

How do I create an EJB project? I just installed WTP SDK M8 and I went to New
project wizard. There was no wizards labeled EJB.
The changes have been released to HEAD.
